original_text: And to the others he said in mine hearing, Go ye after him through the city, and smite: let not your eye spare, neither have ye pity:
korean_text: 그들에 대하여 내 귀에 이르시되 너희는 그를 따라 성읍 중에 다니며 불쌍히 여기지 말며 긍휼을 베풀지 말고 쳐서

sentences.original_text: And to the others he said in mine hearing,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 듣는 가운데 다른 이들에게 말하긴,

sentences.original_text: Go ye after him through the city,
